BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PIST_EMP_AWARDS_DTL (STR_EMP_NO,NUM_SL_NO,STR_AWARD_TYPE,STR_INT_AWARD_DESC,STR_INT_FILE_NO,STR_INT_ORDER_NO,DT_INT_ORDER_DATE,NUM_INT_AWARD_AMOUNT,STR_INT_OTH_AWARD_ENTITY,STR_INT_SANC_AUTH,STR_INT_REMARKS,STR_EXT_LEVEL_OF_AWARD,STR_EXT_AWARD_DESC,STR_EXT_AWARD_AGENCY,STR_EXT_AWARD_AGENCY_ADD,NUM_EXT_AWARD_AMOUNT,STR_EXT_OTH_AWARD_ENTITY,STR_EXT_REMARKS,STR_PR_LEVEL_RECOG, STR_PR_RECOG_DESC, STR_PR_RECOG_ISSUE_NAME, STR_PR_ADDRESS, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PIST_EMP_AWARDS_DTL A SET A.NUM_HOSPITAL_ID=?,A.STR_VALIDATE_STATUS=?,A.DT_VALIDATE_DATE=?,A.STR_VALIDATE_BY=?, A.STR_LEVEL=?, A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE A.STR_EMP_NO=? AND A.NUM_SL_NO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PIST_EMP_AWARDS_DTL A SET A.STR_EMP_NO=?,A.NUM_SL_NO=?,A.STR_AWARD_TYPE=?,A.STR_INT_AWARD_DESC=?,A.STR_INT_FILE_NO=?,A.STR_INT_ORDER_NO=?,A.DT_INT_ORDER_DATE=?,A.NUM_INT_AWARD_AMOUNT=?,A.STR_INT_OTH_AWARD_ENTITY=?,A.STR_INT_SANC_AUTH=?,A.STR_INT_REMARKS=?,A.STR_EXT_LEVEL_OF_AWARD=?,A.STR_EXT_AWARD_DESC=?,A.STR_EXT_AWARD_AGENCY=?,A.STR_EXT_AWARD_AGENCY_ADD=?,A.NUM_EXT_AWARD_AMOUNT=?,A.STR_EXT_OTH_AWARD_ENTITY=?,A.STR_EXT_REMARKS=?,A.STR_PR_LEVEL_RECOG=?,A.STR_PR_RECOG_DESC=?,A.STR_PR_RECOG_ISSUE_NAME=?,A.STR_PR_ADDRESS=?,A.NUM_HOSPITAL_ID=?,A.STR_VALIDATE_STATUS=?,A.DT_VALIDATE_DATE=?,A.STR_VALIDATE_BY=?,A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, A.GNUM_ISVALID=?, A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? WHERE A.STR_EMP_NO=? AND A.NUM_SL_NO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_EMP_AWARDS_DTL A SET A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, A.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE A.STR_EMP_NO=? AND A.NUM_SL_NO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
